ygData.subject: Re: Help I look like a Nazi
ygData.msgSnippet: ... FWIW, the Germans are good engineers, well ahead of their time in WWII.  After an extensive review of combat head injuries in past wars, the newly
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 7 Sep 1999 John.Curry@... wrote:
>
> decked out currently in a full set of banded. I like the protection that it
> gives me, but the helmet has got to go. Banded Helms on a male human look
> like some kind of crazy WWII style third reich comedy. I am constantly
> getting comments about how I look like a schultz from Hogans Hero's. :(
> This was really funny at first and I have laughed my ass off at myself on
> more that one occasion, (especially while doing the silly DDD dance). But
> it is starting to wear on me now, and I need some advice.

FWIW, the Germans are good engineers, well ahead of their time
in WWII. After an extensive review of combat head injuries in
past wars, the newly redesigned U.S. Army helmets look a lot
like the German WWII helmets (better protection around the
temples and back), minus the spire on top.

After you try on a plate helm, you may decide the banded/BI
helm look is not so bad. :-) As alternatives, you could get
a leatherfoot skullcap (quest turning in a dirk, +10 to
charisma) which has the look of leather. Or you could get a
fine silk turban from Hatar (L20 sand giant, rare spawn,
turban is AC 10 and does not show up on your avatar). Be
prepared to pay though - high fashion comes at a price.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
